execCalls((address,uint256,bytes)[]).details: The calls are executed in order, reverting if any of them fails. Can only be called by the owner.

params._token: The token to get the balance of.

returns.splitBalance: The token balance in the split wallet.
returns.warehouseBalance: The token balance in the warehouse of the split wallet.

initialize((address[],uint256[],uint256,.details: Only the factory can call this function.

params._split: The split struct containing the split data that gets initialized.

replaySafeHash(bytes32).details: Returns an EIP-712-compliant hash of `hash`, where the domainSeparator includes address(this) and block.chainId to protect against the same signature being used for many accounts.

updateSplit((address[],uint256[],uint256.details: Only the owner can call this function.

FACTORY().notice: address of Split Wallet V2 factory

getSplitBalance(address).notice: Gets the total token balance of the split wallet and the warehouse.

initialize((address[],uint256[],uint256,.notice: Initializes the split wallet with a split and its corresponding data.

isValidSignature(bytes32,bytes).notice: Validates the signature with ERC1271 return, so that this account can also be used as a signer.

splitHash().notice: the split hash - Keccak256 hash of the split struct

documentation.text: @notice address of Split Wallet V2 factory
@notice the split hash - Keccak256 hash of the split struct
